roleset.name: travel

example.name: intransitive
example.text: This summer, the industry introduced a ``kids fly free'' program, in which children were allowed to fly free if they were traveling with an adult.

example.name: prepositional path
example.text: The shocks generated nerve impulses that-306 [*T*-306] traveled via spine to brain and showed up clearly on a brain-wave monitor, indicating no damage to the delicate spinal tissue.

example.name: adjectival rel: travelled
example.text: You are two years more experienced , travelled , and adventurous .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'travel' based on financial subcorpus, automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'travelled' base on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls run-51.3.2.
